TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BufferedGraphicsContext extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class BufferedGraphicsContext Implements IDisposable
public ref class BufferedGraphicsContext sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 提供建立圖形緩衝區的方法，該緩衝區可用於雙重緩衝 (Double Buffering)。

span.span: Provides methods for creating graphics buffers that can be used for double buffering.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓您實作自訂雙重緩衝的圖形。The class allows you to implement custom double buffering for your graphics. 使用雙重緩衝的圖形可以減少或消除閃爍因重繪顯示介面的。Graphics that use double buffering can reduce or eliminate flicker that is caused by redrawing a display surface. > [!NOTE] > 使用雙重緩衝的最簡單方式是設定控制樣式旗標控制使用方法。The simplest way to use double buffering is to set the control style flag on a control using the method. 設定控制項的控制項樣式旗標將所有繪製控制項的預設圖形緩衝區中，透過重新都導向而不需要任何額外的程式碼。Setting the control styles flag for a control redirects all painting for the control through a default graphics buffer, without requiring any additional code. 若要設定此旗標`true`預設。This flag is set to `true` by default. 類別會提供用於建立及設定圖形緩衝區的方法。The class provides methods for creating and configuring a graphics buffer. 方法會建立，即也提供的方法來寫入緩衝區以及轉譯其內容至輸出裝置，您可以使用圖形緩衝區的包裝函式。The method creates a , which is a wrapper for a graphics buffer that also provides methods you can use to write to the buffer and render its contents to an output device. 您可以擷取目前應用程式定義域靜態屬性。You can retrieve the for the current application domain from the static property. 等動畫大量繪圖功能的應用程式，您可以建立專用使用建構函式，但大部分的應用程式屬性會是足夠。For graphically intensive applications such as animation, you can create a dedicated using the constructor, but for most applications the property will be sufficient. 如需有關繪圖已緩衝的圖形和緩衝處理的自訂實作的詳細資訊，請參閱[雙重緩衝的圖形](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/double-buffered-graphics.md)和[How to： 手動管理已緩衝的圖形](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-manually-manage-buffered-graphics.md)。For more information on drawing buffered graphics and custom buffering implementations, see [Double Buffered Graphics](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/double-buffered-graphics.md) and [How to: Manually Manage Buffered Graphics](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-manually-manage-buffered-graphics.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得目前的應用程式定義域。The following code example demonstrates how to acquire the for the current application domain. 這段程式碼是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[BufferingExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BufferingExamples/CPP/bufferingexamples.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[BufferingExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BufferingExamples/CS/bufferingexamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[BufferingExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BufferingExamples/VB/bufferingexamples.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 等動畫大量繪圖功能的應用程式，您有時可以改善效能使用專用而不是所提供的預設執行個體。For graphically intensive applications such as animation, you can sometimes improve performance by using a dedicated instead of the default instance provided by the . 這可讓您建立及管理個別的圖形緩衝區。This allows you to create and manage graphics buffers individually. > [!NOTE] > 您應該一律呼叫當您完成使用專用。You should always call when you finish using a dedicated . 如需專用的圖形緩衝區的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 手動管理已緩衝的圖形](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-manually-manage-buffered-graphics.md)。For more information about dedicated graphics buffers, see [How to: Manually Manage Buffered Graphics](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-manually-manage-buffered-graphics.md).

span.span: Creates a graphics buffer.

summary.span: 使用指定 的像素格式，建立指定大小的圖形緩衝區。

span.span: Creates a graphics buffer of the specified size using the pixel format of the specified .

returns.span: ，可用於繪製到指定維度的緩衝區。

span.span: A that can be used to draw to a buffer of the specified dimensions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您呼叫方法，其大小超過此值以矩形的屬性、 暫存是用來配置緩衝區，並提供暫時的內容緩衝區。When you call the method with a rectangle whose size exceeds the value of the property, a temporary is created to allocate the buffer and provide a temporary context for the buffer. 新不同應用程式網域和它會自動公開當傳回處置方法。The new is distinct from the for the application domain and it is disposed automatically when the returned by the method is disposed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立使用圖形緩衝區方法。The following code example demonstrates creating a graphics buffer using the method. 這段程式碼是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[BufferingExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BufferingExamples/CPP/bufferingexamples.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[BufferingExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BufferingExamples/CS/bufferingexamples.cs#3)] [!code-vb[BufferingExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BufferingExamples/VB/bufferingexamples.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您呼叫方法，其大小超過此值以矩形的屬性、 暫存是用來配置緩衝區，並提供暫時的內容緩衝區。When you call the method with a rectangle whose size exceeds the value of the property, a temporary is created to allocate the buffer and provide a temporary context for the buffer. 新不同應用程式網域和它會自動公開當傳回處置方法。The new is distinct from the for the application domain and it is disposed automatically when the returned by the method is disposed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立使用圖形緩衝區方法。The following code example demonstrates creating a graphics buffer using the method. 這段程式碼是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則，它所使用的資源將不會釋放直到記憶體回收行程呼叫方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the method of the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 在記憶體回收開始前，允許物件嘗試釋放資源，並執行其他清除作業。

span.span: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Invalidate() cil managed

summary.span: 處置目前的圖形緩衝區，如果已配置緩衝區但尚未處置的話。

span.span: Disposes of the current graphics buffer, if a buffer has been allocated and has not yet been disposed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果正在使用中的圖形緩衝區，它會被標示為處置只要是完全免費。否則，它會處置立即。If the graphics buffer is in use, it will be marked for disposal as soon as it is free; otherwise, it will be disposed immediately.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Size MaximumBuffer { System::Drawing::Size get(); void set(System::Drawing::Size value); };
member this.MaximumBuffer : System.Drawing.Size with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要使用之緩衝區的大小上限。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size of the buffer to use.

value.span: 指出緩衝區維度的最大值。

span.span: A indicating the maximum size of the buffer dimensions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您取得或設定應該保留在記憶體中緩衝區的最大維度。This property allows you to get or set the maximum dimensions for a buffer that should be retained in memory. 可讓您配置的緩衝區大小，不過任何維度大於緩衝區大小會暫時使用後即捨棄時釋放物件。You can allocate a buffer of any size, however any buffer with dimensions greater than the size will be used temporarily and then discarded when the object is released. ## Examples 下列範例會示範設定的緩衝區大小上限。The following example demonstrates setting the maximum size for the buffer for a . 這段程式碼是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[BufferingExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BufferingExamples/CPP/bufferingexamples.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[BufferingExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BufferingExamples/CS/bufferingexamples.cs#2)] [!code-vb[BufferingExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BufferingExamples/VB/bufferingexamples.vb#2)]

exception.span: 大小的高度或寬度小於或等於零。

span.span: The height or width of the size is less than or equal to zero.

permission.span: 允許使用者存取權給所有視窗。

span.span: for allowing user access to all windows.
